nodes.text: A student hoping to become an archivist in the Graf Archive on the moon Orchis 2 descended into the Shadow Stacks collection of unsorted objects beneath the archive in order to bring back an undiscovered treasure as part of his training. While in the Shadow Stacks he discovered how dangerous the archives could be while examining a ghest he believed to be mummified that turned out to simply be hibernating.
The student was first mentioned in the introduction to the reference book Star Wars: Galactic Atlas, which was written by Tim McDonagh and released on November 3, 2016.
